about_the_game:
Rift Drift invites you to master the art of momentum-based drifting as you pilot customizable rockets through an endless universe of procedurally generated levels and biomes. Whether you're chasing a zen-like flow or an adrenaline-fueled race, each run offers new challenges and infinite replayability. Drift, boost, and discover diverse landscapes, upgrade your craft, and set new records

Features:

  • Drifty physics based movement

  • Endless & Time-based game modes

  • Minimal textured vector graphics

  • Technically no speed cap

Rift Drift invites you to master the art of momentum-based drifting as you pilot customizable rockets through an endless universe of procedurally generated levels and biomes. Whether you're chasing a zen-like flow or an adrenaline-fueled race, each run offers new challenges and infinite replayability. Drift, boost, and discover diverse landscapes, upgrade your craft, and set new records!

Key Features

  • Drifty Momentum Based Physics: Embrace a unique movement system designed for drifting, where building speed and maintaining control is key to mastering your runs and carving perfect paths.

  • Infinite & Time Trial Game Modes: Choose between an endless journey through evolving biomes or test your skills in intense, time-based challenges. Each mode offers a fresh way to play.

  • Minimalist Vector Graphics: Experience a visually clean, stylistic aesthetic that emphasizes the beauty of your surroundings without distraction, allowing you to immerse yourself in the flow of each drift.

  • No Speed Limit: Push your craft as fast as your skills allow—there’s technically no speed cap, making each run as fast or as serene as you choose.

  • Procedurally Generated Worlds: Every level and biome is generated on the fly, giving you an endless array of unique landscapes and obstacles to conquer.

  • Rocket Customization & Upgrades: Tune and upgrade your rocket’s performance to match your drifting style, and experiment with different setups to improve your performance.

  • High Scores & Records: Set and chase high scores as you refine your drifting technique and uncover new strategies for each level.

Whether you're in it for a relaxing drift or a high-speed test of your reflexes, Rift Drift offers an endless canvas for you to explore and master. Dive in, drift on, and discover just how far you can push your rocket and your skills.

What Rift Drift Offers:

  • Intuitive, physics-driven drifting mechanics

  • Endless procedural biomes and levels

  • Customizable rockets with upgrade options

  • Minimalist, immersive graphics

  • A journey you can enjoy in short bursts or epic sessions

  • Challenging gameplay with no speed ceiling

  • A community-driven high score chase
